'''The Dreamy Creamy Summer''' was a bit and fundraiser<ref>[https://www.gofundme.com/f/dreamycreamysummer Dreamy Creamy Summer GoFundMe]</ref><ref>[https://www.gofundme.com/f/lets-put-a-button-on-the-dreamy-creamy-summer Let's Put A Button On The Dreamy Creamy Summer GoFundMe]</ref> run by [[Dan Friesen|Dan]] in the summer of 2022.

Started based on a out of context drop, the original idea was that Dan would review unusual ice creams and similar treats.
